languages.text: "Допустим, "ажи" — так я зову всякого злодея и подонка, ибо "ажи" есть и зло, и враг, и ничтожный червь, недостойный даже лишней мысли. Или же "ашмаг" — глупец, и младший брат, и слепой, что не разбирает дороги и без чужого наставления упадет в яму. "Шерин" же... "шерин" есть друг, и товарищ, и сосед в боевом построении — как мы с вами, {name}".

"Take 'azhi,' for example. That is what I call every piece of scum and villain, because 'azhi' means evil, and foe, and pathetic worm unworthy of consideration. Or take 'ashmag' — it means fool, and little brother, and blind man who stumbles and would fall into a pit without guidance. 'Shereen' is... 'shereen' means friend, and comrade, and rowmate in a battle formation — like we are, {name}."
languages.original_text: "Допустим, "ажи" — так я зову всякого злодея и подонка, ибо "ажи" есть и зло, и враг, и ничтожный червь, недостойный даже лишней мысли. Или же "ашмаг" — глупец, и младший брат, и слепой, что не разбирает дороги и без чужого наставления упадет в яму. "Шерин" же... "шерин" есть друг, и товарищ, и сосед в боевом построении — как мы с вами, {name}".

traits.locale_text: "Take 'maadari', for example. This is how I call the xenos of the Koronus Expanse, because 'maadari' is evil, and foe, and pathetic worm unworthy of consideration. Or take 'ashmag' that means fool, and little brother, and blind man who stumbles and would fall into a pit without guidance. 'Shereen' is... 'shereen' means friend, and comrade, and neighbor in a battle formation — like we are, {name}".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “举个例子，比如‘鬼怪’这个词，我会用来称呼那些人渣与恶棍，因为这个词原本的意思是邪恶、敌人，以及毫无价值的可怜虫。再举个例子，比如‘坏种’这个词，它原本的意思是傻瓜，表弟，以及那些跌跌撞撞，若是失去指引便会掉进坑里的瞎子。至于‘亲爱的’……这个词指的是朋友、同志，以及生死与共的战友，正如你我一样，{name}。”
languages.original_text: "Take 'azhi,' for example. That is what I call every piece of scum and villain, because 'azhi' means evil, and foe, and pathetic worm unworthy of consideration. Or take 'ashmag' — it means fool, and little brother, and blind man who stumbles and would fall into a pit without guidance. 'Shereen' is... 'shereen' means friend, and comrade, and rowmate in a battle formation — like we are, {name}."

traits.locale_text: “举个例子，比如‘鬼怪’这个词，我会用来称呼那些人渣与恶棍，因为这个词原本的意思是邪恶、敌人，以及毫无价值的可怜虫。再举个例子，比如‘坏家伙’这个词，它原本的意思是傻瓜、弟弟、以及那些跌跌撞撞，若是失去指引便会掉进坑里的瞎子。至于‘亲爱的’……这个词指的是朋友、同志，以及生死与共的战友，正如你我一样，{name}。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "Take 'azhi,' for example. That is what I call every piece of scum and villain, because 'azhi' means evil, and foe, and pathetic worm unworthy of consideration. Or take 'ashmag' — it means fool, and little brother, and blind man who stumbles and would fall into a pit without guidance. 'Shereen' is... 'shereen' means friend, and comrade, and rowmate in a battle formation — like we are, ."

languages.text: «Mira "azhi", por ejemplo. Así llamo a la gentuza y a los villanos, porque "azhi" significa mal, enemigo y gusano patético indigno de atención. O "ashmag": necio, hermano pequeño y hombre ciego que tropezaría y se caería a un foso sin ayuda. "Shereen" es... "shereen" significa amigo, camarada y compañero en una formación de batalla: como nosotr{mf|o|a}s, {name}».
languages.original_text: "Take 'azhi,' for example. That is what I call every piece of scum and villain, because 'azhi' means evil, and foe, and pathetic worm unworthy of consideration. Or take 'ashmag' — it means fool, and little brother, and blind man who stumbles and would fall into a pit without guidance. 'Shereen' is... 'shereen' means friend, and comrade, and rowmate in a battle formation — like we are, {name}."

traits.locale_text: «Mira "azhi", por ejemplo. Así llamo a la gentuza y a los villanos, porque "azhi" significa mal, enemigo y gusano patético indigno de atención. O "ashmag": necio, hermano pequeño y hombre ciego que tropezaría y se caería a un foso sin ayuda. "Shereen" es... "shereen" significa amigo, camarada y compañero en una formación de batalla: como nosotr{mf|o|a}s, {name}».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「例えば『アジー』。こいつは悪や敵、考えるに値しない哀れな虫けらっていう感じの意味よ。あるいは『アッシュマグ』…これは愚か者や弟分、導きなしにはつまづいて落とし穴に落ちる目の前が見えてないヤツのことを意味するの。『シャリーン』っていうのは…友人や同志、戦闘陣形における同列の仲間を意味するのよ…あたしたちのようにね、{name}様」
languages.original_text: "Take 'azhi,' for example. That is what I call every piece of scum and villain, because 'azhi' means evil, and foe, and pathetic worm unworthy of consideration. Or take 'ashmag' — it means fool, and little brother, and blind man who stumbles and would fall into a pit without guidance. 'Shereen' is... 'shereen' means friend, and comrade, and rowmate in a battle formation — like we are, {name}."

traits.locale_text: 「例えば『アジー』。こいつは悪や敵、考えるに値しない哀れな虫けらっていう感じの意味よ。あるいは『アッシュマグ』…これは愚か者や弟分、導きなしにはつまづいて落とし穴に落ちる目の前が見えてないヤツのことを意味するの。『シャリーン』っていうのは…友人や同志、戦闘陣形における同列の仲間を意味するのよ…あたしたちのようにね、{name}様」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Nehmen wir zum Beispiel 'Azhi'. So nenne ich jeden Drecksack und Schurken, jeden Abschaum, denn 'Azhi' heißt 'böse' und 'Feind' und 'erbärmlicher Wurm, meiner Zeit nicht würdig'. Oder nehmen wir 'Ashmag' — das heißt 'Narr' und 'kleiner Bruder' und 'blinder Mann, der ohne Hilfe stolpern und in eine Gruppe fallen würde'. 'Shereen' ist ... 'Shereen' heißt 'Freund' und 'Kamerad' und 'Nachbar in einer Kampfformation' — wie wir es sind, {name}."
languages.original_text: "Take 'azhi,' for example. That is what I call every piece of scum and villain, because 'azhi' means evil, and foe, and pathetic worm unworthy of consideration. Or take 'ashmag' — it means fool, and little brother, and blind man who stumbles and would fall into a pit without guidance. 'Shereen' is... 'shereen' means friend, and comrade, and rowmate in a battle formation — like we are, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Nehmen wir zum Beispiel 'Azhi'. So nenne ich jeden Drecksack und Schurken, jeden Abschaum, denn 'Azhi' heißt 'böse' und 'Feind' und 'erbärmlicher Wurm, meiner Zeit nicht würdig'. Oder nehmen wir 'Ashmag' — das heißt 'Narr' und 'kleiner Bruder' und 'blinder Mann, der ohne Hilfe stolpern und in eine Gruppe fallen würde'. 'Shereen' ist ... 'Shereen' heißt 'Freund' und 'Kamerad' und 'Nachbar in einer Kampfformation' — wie wir es sind, {name}."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Prenez "azhi", par exemple. C'est ainsi que je qualifie tous les scélérats, car ce mot signifie "mal", "ennemi", "pitoyable vermisseau indigne de considération". Ou encore "ashmag", qui veut dire "imbécile", "petit frère" et "homme aveugle qui trébuche et tomberait dans une fosse s'il n'avait personne pour le guider". Quant à "shereen"... C'est le terme que nous employons pour dire "ami", "camarade", "compagnon d'armes qui se bat à nos côtés"... ce que vous êtes à mes yeux, {name}. »
languages.original_text: "Take 'azhi,' for example. That is what I call every piece of scum and villain, because 'azhi' means evil, and foe, and pathetic worm unworthy of consideration. Or take 'ashmag' — it means fool, and little brother, and blind man who stumbles and would fall into a pit without guidance. 'Shereen' is... 'shereen' means friend, and comrade, and rowmate in a battle formation — like we are, {name}."

traits.locale_text: « Prenez "azhi", par exemple. C'est ainsi que je qualifie tous les scélérats, car ce mot signifie "mal", "ennemi", "pitoyable vermisseau indigne de considération". Ou encore "ashmag", qui veut dire "imbécile", "petit frère" et "homme aveugle qui trébuche et tomberait dans une fosse s'il n'avait personne pour le guider". Quant à "shereen"... C'est le terme que nous employons pour dire "ami", "camarade", "compagnon d'armes qui se bat à nos côtés"... ce que vous êtes à mes yeux, {name}. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "'Azhi' kelimesi mesela. Her türlü pisliğe ve kötülüğe böyle diyorum çünkü 'azhi', kötü ve düşman demek olduğu kadar umursamaya değmez, zavallı solucan da demektir. 'Külboğaz'; sersem, küçük kardeş, bir de yardım edilmezse çukura düşecek kör adam anlamlarına gelir. 'Şirinim'; özünde arkadaş, yoldaş ve savaş düzeninde aynı safta olan gibi bir anlam taşır. Biz gibi yani {name}."
languages.original_text: "Take 'azhi,' for example. That is what I call every piece of scum and villain, because 'azhi' means evil, and foe, and pathetic worm unworthy of consideration. Or take 'ashmag' — it means fool, and little brother, and blind man who stumbles and would fall into a pit without guidance. 'Shereen' is... 'shereen' means friend, and comrade, and rowmate in a battle formation — like we are, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "'Azhi' kelimesi mesela. Her türlü pisliğe ve kötülüğe böyle diyorum çünkü 'azhi' kötü ve düşman demek olduğu kadar değerlendirmeye değmez zavallı solucan da demektir. 'Külboğaz' da aslında senin anladığından farklı bir anlam taşır. Sersem demektir, küçük kardeş demektir ve yardım edilmezse çukura düşecek kör bir adam demektir. 'Şirinim' de aynı şekilde dilimizde farklı bir anlama sahiptir. Özünde arkadaş, yoldaş ve savaş diziliminde seninle aynı safta olan gibi bir anlam taşır. Bizim gibi yani {name}."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
